org.springframework.data.repository.reactive

接口 ReactiveCrudRepository<T,ID>

  • 所有超级接口:
    Repository<T,ID>
    所有已知子接口:
    ReactiveSortingRepository<T,ID>

    @NoRepositoryBean
public interface ReactiveCrudRepository<T,ID>
extends Repository<T,ID>
    Interface for generic CRUD operations on a repository for a specific type. This repository follows reactive paradigms and uses Project Reactor types which are built on top of Reactive Streams.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0
    另请参阅:
    Mono, Flux

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Mono<Long> count()
      Returns the number of entities available.
      Mono<Void> delete(T entity)
      Deletes a given entity.
      Mono<Void> deleteAll()
      Deletes all entities managed by the repository.
      Mono<Void> deleteAll(Iterable<? extends T> entities)
      Deletes the given entities.
      Mono<Void> deleteAll(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<? extends T> entityStream)
      Deletes the given entities supplied by a Publisher.
      Mono<Void> deleteById(ID id)
      Deletes the entity with the given id.
      Mono<Void> deleteById(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<ID> id)
      Deletes the entity with the given id supplied by a Publisher.
      Mono<Boolean> existsById(ID id)
      Returns whether an entity with the id exists.
      Mono<Boolean> existsById(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<ID> id)
      Returns whether an entity with the given id, supplied by a Publisher, exists.
      Flux<T> findAll()
      Returns all instances of the type.
      Flux<T> findAllById(Iterable<ID> ids)
      Returns all instances with the given IDs.
      Flux<T> findAllById(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<ID> idStream)
      Returns all instances of the type with the given IDs supplied by a Publisher.
      Mono<T> findById(ID id)
      Retrieves an entity by its id.
      Mono<T> findById(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<ID> id)
      Retrieves an entity by its id supplied by a Publisher.
      <S extends T>
      Mono<S>      		 save(S entity)
      Saves a given entity.
      <S extends T>
      Flux<S>      		 saveAll(Iterable<S> entities)
      Saves all given entities.
      <S extends T>
      Flux<S>      		 saveAll(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<S> entityStream)
      Saves all given entities.

    • 方法详细资料

      • save

        <S extends T> Mono<S> save(S entity)
        Saves a given entity. Use the returned instance for further operations as the save operation might have changed the entity instance completely.
        参数:
        entity - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono emitting the saved entity.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the given entity is null.

      • saveAll

        <S extends T> Flux<S> saveAll(Iterable<S> entities)
        Saves all given entities.
        参数:
        entities - must not be null.
        返回:
        Flux emitting the saved entities.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the given Iterable entities is null.

      • saveAll

        <S extends T> Flux<S> saveAll(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<S> entityStream)
        Saves all given entities.
        参数:
        entityStream - must not be null.
        返回:
        Flux emitting the saved entities.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the given Publisher entityStream is null.

      • findById

        Mono<T> findById(ID id)
        Retrieves an entity by its id.
        参数:
        id - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono emitting the entity with the given id or Mono.empty() if none found.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the given id is null.

      • findById

        Mono<T> findById(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<ID> id)
        Retrieves an entity by its id supplied by a Publisher.
        参数:
        id - must not be null. Uses the first emitted element to perform the find-query.
        返回:
        Mono emitting the entity with the given id or Mono.empty() if none found.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the given Publisher id is null.

      • existsById

        Mono<Boolean> existsById(ID id)
        Returns whether an entity with the id exists.
        参数:
        id - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono emitting true if an entity with the given id exists, false otherwise.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the given id is null.

      • existsById

        Mono<Boolean> existsById(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<ID> id)
        Returns whether an entity with the given id, supplied by a Publisher, exists. Uses the first emitted element to perform the exists-query.
        参数:
        id - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono emitting true if an entity with the given id exists, false otherwise
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the given Publisher id is null.

      • findAll

        Flux<T> findAll()
        Returns all instances of the type.
        返回:
        Flux emitting all entities.

      • findAllById

        Flux<T> findAllById(Iterable<ID> ids)
        Returns all instances with the given IDs.
        参数:
        ids - must not be null.
        返回:
        Flux emitting the found entities.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the given Iterable ids is null.

      • findAllById

        Flux<T> findAllById(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<ID> idStream)
        Returns all instances of the type with the given IDs supplied by a Publisher.
        参数:
        idStream - must not be null.
        返回:
        Flux emitting the found entities.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the given Publisher idStream is null.

      • count

        Mono<Long> count()
        Returns the number of entities available.
        返回:
        Mono emitting the number of entities.

      • deleteById

        Mono<Void> deleteById(ID id)
        Deletes the entity with the given id.
        参数:
        id - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono signaling when operation has completed.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the given id is null.

      • deleteById

        Mono<Void> deleteById(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<ID> id)
        Deletes the entity with the given id supplied by a Publisher.
        参数:
        id - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono signaling when operation has completed.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the given Publisher id is null.

      • delete

        Mono<Void> delete(T entity)
        Deletes a given entity.
        参数:
        entity - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono signaling when operation has completed.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the given entity is null.

      • deleteAll

        Mono<Void> deleteAll(Iterable<? extends T> entities)
        Deletes the given entities.
        参数:
        entities - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono signaling when operation has completed.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the given Iterable entities is null.

      • deleteAll

        Mono<Void> deleteAll(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<? extends T> entityStream)
        Deletes the given entities supplied by a Publisher.
        参数:
        entityStream - must not be null.
        返回:
        Mono signaling when operation has completed.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the given Publisher entityStream is null.

      • deleteAll

        Mono<Void> deleteAll()
        Deletes all entities managed by the repository.
        返回:
        Mono signaling when operation has completed.
